topics.body:
"@gasmaskangel":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5413e0b263687229a46d0000#post_5413e0b263687229a46d0000
[bq="gasmaskangel"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5413e0076368727810050000#post_5413e0076368727810050000
That is, no shit, my dream. I want to write an actual erotic novel. Granted the actualy publishing industry for them seems to have died down quite a bit, so I'd have to self publish through amazon or something, but still. It is what I really want to do with my life more than anything.[/bq]

sounds like a good dream.

my dream is to produce an LP
